description: CSS styles for managing themes and layout for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main container for the application with center-aligned content.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo with animation.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Header section for the application, styled to be flexible and centered.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the application.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes.
